list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Many many things: refactor the entire warehouse system. - backend: - change from material to product - redesign the entire system with query anche actions - implement event-driven pattern for warehouse - many refactors - implementing laravel data by spatie for request and resources. maybe some fix will be add
frontend: - fix pages with new product - change some pages and add new features

task.summary: Implementing workers module and fix customer form submitting
Fix UI workers implementation with some type fixes
Adding: - notification center and - material requests from - New external worker invitation system with token
Adding: - Docker support for frontend with DockerFile and docker-compose.yaml
Continue implementing worker site assignment implementi crea worker roles crud management

Adding new feature to manage permission in frontend. User based on own role can see or note some pages and menus. Fix server side components and starting implementig nexjs 16+ best practies. Move many file and starting refactor the frontend with shared layout
Fix setAuth parameters in worker invitation. Now is httpOnly and accept only the user without token
Change docs PERMISSIONS_QUICK_REFERENCE.tsx.md with md extension due tue compile error
Try fixing auth cookie with .env variables
Fix auth cookie with .env variables with check .env script and documentation
